title: Ep. 557 - With Malice Toward All
description:
From CNN to the Minnesota government, prominent leftists defend political violence, public health officials change their story on coronavirus, and the rioters kill Robert E. Lee again. Plus, the Mailbag!

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/knowles
